ISSUE.TITLE: Access Android Connected via Wifi
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: First STF working Great if we connect device via USB. I was trying to connect device to adb with wifi ``` adb tcpip 5555 adb connect mobile-ip:5555 ``` But now adb show wifi connected device on `adb devices` command but stf display that device as disconnected.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: OSTF-#16: User is not allowed to delete the Admins user group
Merge branch 'OSTF-17' into 'master' OSTF-#16: User is not allowed to delete the Admins user group See merge request timo.guehring/stf!8
#16 Add more details to each category of iOS devices

[Security] Bump moment from 2.18.1 to 2.27.0 (#16) Bumps [moment](https://github.com/moment/moment) from 2.18.1 to 2.27.0. **This update includes a security fix.** - [Release notes](https://github.com/moment/moment/releases) - [Changelog](https://github.com/moment/moment/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md) - [Commits](https://github.com/moment/moment/compare/2.18.1...2.27.0) Signed-off-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <support@dependabot.com> Co-authored-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <27856297+dependabot-preview[bot]@users.noreply.github.com>
